reg_pit.title:
Exempt Projects, Programs, Contracts
and Expenditures Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definitions of "Mclymont Project" and "Volcano Project" were added by BC Reg 227/2011, effective December 8, 2011.
Section 2 (a.1) and (a.2) were added by BC Reg 227/2011, effective December 8, 2011.
